description: This Kotlin source file defines data structures and a singleton repository for expense tracker categories. It includes placeholder icon resources, a data class for category entries, and an in-memory repository with seed data representing income and expense categories, along with methods for accessing the categories.

classes.name: PlaceholderIcons
classes.description: Object containing constants for placeholder icon resources for categories, mapping to system drawable resources indicating income and expense icons.

classes.name: CategoryEntry
classes.description: Data class representing a category with id, title, color, expense flag, and optional icon resource. It models the categories used in the expense tracker app.

classes.name: CategoriesRepository
classes.description: Singleton object acting as an in-memory repository for categories, seeded with example categories for income and expenses, providing methods to retrieve all categories or a specific category by ID.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Returns a list of all seeded categories.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a category by its key/id, or null if not found.
